lathage mallila atharin latha wadiyenma aadare kale rathna mallitaya...ada ohu jiwathun athara nathath ee aadaraya marila natha.kuda koluwa una hadi wilapa deddi punchi latha ohu ukule thaba nalewuwe amma darata gos siti nisaya.eeth parak kara ganimata nohaki wu thana dodan kada dennaya kiyamin punchi eka ragena midulata basse adille hada enna ennama wadi wana nisaya.ganu lamayi gas naginne natha...dan kohomada dodan kadanne....podi eka dan adanne dodan illalaya.onna ethakotama gahen idunu gediyak bimata watichchi....podi ekage adilla ethaninma kammuthuyilu oon.

santha pithara widuhal pile anuradha herath wishishta uthsahaka dinum dekak raskirime hethuwen isipathana widuhalata erehiwa lakunu 12-10k lesa jaya labu santha pithara widuhal pila singar kusalana samastha lanka anthar pasal sath samajika awurudu 20n pahala ragar shurathawa athkara ganimata samathwiya.tharagaye palamu bhagaye di lakunu 10-0k lesa idiriyen siti isipathana widuhal pilata dewani bhagayedi lakunu ras kirimata awasthawa labanodun santha pithara widuhal kridakayo aakramanashili krida ratawaka nirathawima kapi penuni.santha pithara widuhale jayagrahanayata man wiwara kala anuradha herath tharagawaliye wiraya sammanaya dina gaththeya.

api diyunu wechcha minisun gana hina dakinawa,samahara aya hullanawa,eth poddak hoyala balanna ee minissu othanata ennata paya kiyak wada karada kiyala,adatath owun nidaganne paya kiyada kiyala.dawasata koyi tharam wada pramanayak karanawada kiyala.ape rate pradhana purawasiya wana janadhipathige idan loku putuwala inna aya gana hithannako?deshapalana konayen eliyata awith baluwoth eda idan ada dakwa ee minisun koyi tharam mahansiyak wenawada?hama thapparayakma owunata itha wadagath,ape rate doktars la injiniyarsala,guruwaru wyaparikayan wani sarthaka hamakenek ganama hoyala balanna.therewi koyi tharam kalayak owun dawasata wehesenawada kiyala .
noyekuth hethun nisa jala dushanaya siduwiya hakiya, jala sampatha ha parisaraya dushanayawimen walakalannata apita kala haki punchi dayakathwayak gana sakachcha kirimayi mema lipiye aramuna.
mekedi athuru karanayak widiyata mathak karanna oona, lankawe eelanga janadhipathi wenna balaporoththu wena sahena pirisak inna bawak penna thiyena bawath.
